>
[Lodestone Pellet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1591)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #179: Cradle of Quartz](/Sources.aspx?ID=122) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** pellet

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These round, black pellets are made from magically enhanced magnetic lodestone. They can be loaded into an [air repeater](/Weapons.aspx?ID=188) or [long air repeater](/Weapons.aspx?ID=194). When activated, lodestone pellets provide a +1 circumstance bonus to ranged Strikes made against creatures made of metal or wearing metal armor.
